summary: This will rename the thieves that you encounter on the roads with more appealing one.
descriptionHtml:
This will rename the thieves that you encounter on the roads with more [color=#ffff00][size=6]appealing one[/size][/color].

French Version available thanks to [b]our friend setvi[/b] [size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84645/?]Creation Thief French[/url][/size]

I don't know what the heck is happening to the creators of the skyrim and fallout 4 are they becoming too greedy?

I smell paid mods.

I don't know what is on the mind of those people who agree with that kind of racket, I respect them if thats what they want.

But me I'm still with nexus I don't know if DarkOne will ever read this but, thank you for creating the nexus community.

I grow with this site I learn to create my mods here and I gain some friends here.
author: dlarkz
